phokimo.src.terachem_values

Classes

Reactions(toml, rate_constant)

State_Values(toml)

class phokimo.src.terachem_values.State_Values(toml)
__init__(toml) → None

Extract data from terachem output based on the kinetic model.

Reads given toml file for the kinetic modeling and get data from terachem based on it.

Parameters:

toml – TomlReader(toml_file_path) that reads toml file

terachem_output(num: int, calculation_path: str, max_roots: int = 3) → tuple

Get the energy and oscillation strength from terachem output.

Parameters:

  • num (int) – numbering of the searching state

  • calculation_path (str) – absolute path of calculation directory

  • max_roots (int, optional) – Number of roots to extract from. Defaults to 3.

Returns:

energies (Eh) and oscillator strengths (-)

Return type:

tuple

state_list_hartree(calculation_path: str) → list

Generate a list with a hartree energy(Eh) of each state.

Parameters:

calculation_path (str) – absolute path of calculation directory

Returns:

energy(Eh) of each state

Return type:

list

state_list_energy(calculation_path: str) → list

Generate a list with a energy(J/mol) of each state.

Returns:

energy(J/mol) of each state

Return type:

list

oscilstr(calculation_path: str) → list

Generate a list with an oscillation strength of each state.

Oscillation strength only appears for excited states, so would be zero for the ground state.

Parameters:

calculation_path (str) – absolute path of calculation directory

Returns:

oscillation strength for each state

Return type:

list

class phokimo.src.terachem_values.Reactions(toml, rate_constant)
__init__(toml, rate_constant)

Figure out reaction connection and calculate rate constant.

Use toml data for reaction and terachem output to calculate rate constants.

Parameters:

  • toml – TomlReader(toml_file_path) that reads toml file

  • rate_constant – RateCalculator() that calculates rate constants

graph_table_name() → list

Generate a list with reaction connection with state names.

Returns:

graph edge tuples that represent the reaction with state names

Return type:

list

graph_table_num() → list

Generate a list with reaction connection with state numberings.

Returns:

graph edge tuples that represent the reaction with state numberings

Return type:

list

dEs(state_list_energy: list) → ndarray

Calculate the energy differences of each reaction.

dEs[initial_state][final_state] = final energy - initial energy (for reactions with transition state, excitation energy)

Parameters:

state_list_energy (list) – energy(J/mol) of each state

Returns:

rate constants

Return type:

np.ndarray

rates(state_list_energy: list) → ndarray

Calculate the rate constants of each reaction.

Parameters:

state_list_energy (list) – energy(J/mol) of each state

Returns:

rate constants

Return type:

np.ndarray
